column4: I am having a problem one is that my keyboard layout keeps changing from dvorak back to qwerty even though I have removed the qwerty layout and it seems at random times it goes back to qwerty and I have to run setxkbmap dvorak in a launcher. How do I fix this?
Do you have a bind to change layout that you're not aware of?
not that I know of, and it keeps doing it at random times
